
an evening stroll

# BITSY VERSION 4.5

! ROOM_FORMAT 1

ROOM 0
0,0,0,0,0,d,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,e,0,0

g,g,g,g,g,g,g,g,g,g,g,g,g,g,g,g

l,l,l,l,l,l,l,l,l,l,l,l,l,l,l,l
m,m,m,m,m,m,m,m,m,m,m,m,m,m,m,m

g,g,g,g,g,g,g,g,g,g,g,g,g,g,g,g
b,b,b,b,b,b,b,b,b,b,b,b,b,b,b,b
ITM 0 12,10
ITM 1 8,10
ITM 2 4,10
END 0 0,10
PAL 0

NAME block3
DLG ITM_2

DLG SPR_0
I'm a cat

DLG ITM_0
look up at the {clr2}stars{clr2}

DLG SPR_1
Who am I?

DLG ITM_1
listen to the {wvy}waves{wvy}

DLG ITM_2
{clr3}take a deep breath...{clr3}

END 0
enjoy life for the moment

VAR a
42
